HOUSE COMMITTEES

JUSTICE

 

JURISDICTION: All matters directly and principally relating to the administration of justice, the Judiciary, the practice of law and integration of the Bar, legal aid, penitentiaries and reform

CHAIRPERSON :

Ferrer, Juliet Marie de Leon

District Representative
Negros Occidental, 4th District

 
  • COMMITTEE MEMBERS
  • PRIMARY REFERRAL
  • SECONDARY REFERRAL
  • MEETINGS

PRIMARY REFFERED HOUSE BILLS 451

HB00008
[History] [Text As Filed]
 

Significance: N

Date Filed: 2022-06-30

Full Title, As Filed: AN ACT PROVIDING FREE LEGAL ASSISTANCE TO ANY OFFICER OR UNIFORMED PERSONNEL OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES, THE BUREAU OF FIRE PROTECTION, THE BUREAU OF JAIL MANAGEMENT AND PENOLOGY, THE PHILIPPINE COAST GUARD, AND THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE, FACING ANY CHARGE BEFORE THE PROSECUTOR’S OFFICE, COURT OR ANY COMPETENT BODY ARISING FROM AN INCIDENT RELATED TO THE PERFORMANCE OF OFFICIAL DUTY, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR

Principal Author/s: 1. ROMUALDEZ, FERDINAND MARTIN G.2. ROMUALDEZ, YEDDA MARIE K.3. MARCOS, FERDINAND ALEXANDER A.4. ACIDRE, JUDE A.

Date Read: 2022-07-26

Bill Status: Substituted by HB06509

Mother Bill Status: Approved by the House on 2022-12-12, transmitted to the Senate on 2022-12-14 and received by the Senate on 2022-12-14

HB00114
[History] [Text As Filed]
 

Significance: N

Date Filed: 2022-06-30

Full Title, As Filed: AN ACT IMPOSING STIFFER PENALTIES FOR FALSIFICATION OF CERTIFICATES OF LAND TITLE OR ANY APPLICATION, DEED, INSTRUMENT OR SUPPORTING DOCUMENT, REASONABLY CONNECTED WITH AND CALCULATED TO CAUSE THE ISSUANCE OF A CERTIFICATE OF LAND TITLE, CLASSIFYING THE SAME AS HEINOUS OFFENSE INVOLVING ECONOMIC SABOTAGE IF THE VALUE OR AGGREGATE VALUE OF THE LAND IS AT LEAST TEN MILLION PESOS (P10,000,000.00), AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE ARTICLES 171 AND 172 OF ACT NO. 3815, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS, THE REVISED PENALCODE AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

Principal Author/s: 1. LOYOLA, ROY M.

Date Read: 2022-07-26

Bill Status: Pending with the Committee on JUSTICE since 2022-07-26

HB01197
[History] [Text As Filed]
 

Significance: N

Date Filed: 2022-07-05

Full Title, As Filed: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE SUMMARY TITLING OF REAL PROPERTIES USED AS SITES FOR PUBLIC SCHOOLS NATIONWIDE, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

Significance: N

Date Filed: 2023-11-08

Full Title, As Filed: AN ACT CREATING TEN (10) ADDITIONAL BRANCHES OF THE REGIONAL TRIAL COURT AND THREE (3) ADDITIONAL BRANCHES OF THE MUNICIPAL TRIAL COURT IN CITIES IN THE FOURTH JUDICIAL REGION TO BE STATIONED IN THE CITY OF SANTA ROSA, PROVINCE OF LAGUNA, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 14 (E) AND SECTION 29 OF BATAS PAMBANSA BLG. 129, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS 'THE JUDICIARY REORGANIZATION ACT OF 1980', AS AMENDED

Principal Author/s: 1. FERNANDEZ, DAN S.2. FERRER, JULIET MARIE DE LEON3. CO, ELIZALDY S.4. QUIMBO, STELLA LUZ A.5. PUMAREN, FRANZ S.6. PALMA, WILTER Y.7. ALBANO, ANTONIO "Tonypet" T.8. SCHEDULE OF MEETINGS

Unless otherwise indicated, all committee meeting venues are located at the House of Representatives Complex.


Select Week
 

28-FEBRUARY-2024 • WEDNESDAY
Committee/Sub-CommitteeTime and Venue
JUSTICE
Agenda		09:30 AM
Face-to-face meeting at the R.R. Andaya Hall 2/F Main Bldg. (To be livestreamed on the official Facebook page of the HRep)
HB 6568 – Granting Philippine citizenship to Hu Jianguo (Majority Leader Manuel Jose ‘Mannix’ Dalipe)

HB 9108 – Strengthening the legal staff of the Department of Justice, renaming it as the Office of the Chief State Counsel, redefining, expanding, rationalizing, and further professionalizing its organization and appropriating funds therefor (Rep. Rufus Rodriguez)

LEGISLATIVE CALENDAR
NINETEENTH CONGRESS, SECOND REGULAR SESSON

HOUSE CONCURRENT RESOLUTION NO. 16

Introduced by Representatives
Manuel Jose "Mannix" M. Dalipe and Marcelino C. Libanan

CONCURRENT RESOLUTION

PROVIDING FOR THE LEGISLATIVE CALENDAR FOR THE SECOND REGULAR SESSION OF THE NINETEENTH CONGRESS OF THE PHILIPPINES

RESOLVED BY THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, THE SENATE CONCURRING, That the Legislative Calendar for the Second Regular Session of the Nineteenth Congress of the Philippines shall be as follows:

 

CALENDAR OF SESSION
SECOND REGULAR SESSION

1. Commencement of Session July 24, 2023 - September 29, 2023
2. Adjournment of Session September 30, 2023 - November 5, 2023
3. Resumption of Session November 6, 2023 - December 15, 2023
4. Adjournment of Session December 16, 2023 - January 21, 2024
5. Resumption of Session January 22, 2024 - March 22, 2024
6. Adjournment of Session March 23, 2024 - April 28, 2024
7. Resumption of Session April 29, 2024 - May 24, 2024
(Sine Die Adjournment)
8. Adjournment of Session May 25, 2024 - July 21, 2024
